LanguageData.AK_Recruit_Absinthe.description: Unlike last time, she perhaps can once again take up the mantle of a protector. Absinthe, Caster Operator, is always ready to eliminate any threats.
LanguageData.AK_Recruit_Absinthe.name: Absinthe
LanguageData.AK_Recruit_Amiya.description: Keep fighting, Doctor. Amiya, leader of Rhodes Island, will fight alongside you.
LanguageData.AK_Recruit_Amiya.name: Amiya
LanguageData.AK_Recruit_Astgenne.description: Elena, Rhine Lab researcher. You may call her Astgenne on Rhodes Island./nShe is a spark of lightning as well as a trumpet by your side.
LanguageData.AK_Recruit_Astgenne.name: Astgenne
LanguageData.AK_Recruit_Beeswax.description: Beeswax, shaman priestess from the Sargon Desert, brings her blessings from the golden sands. Allowing one to touch the horns is a symbol of intimacy, trust, and respect between the two parties.
LanguageData.AK_Recruit_Beeswax.name: Beeswax
LanguageData.AK_Recruit_Carnelian.description: Caster Operator Carnelian, mature and calm, yet partial to some havoc now and then. If she laughs while staring at the enemy, most likely she's just considering how to tear them to ribbons.
LanguageData.AK_Recruit_Carnelian.name: Carnelian
LanguageData.AK_Recruit_Ceobe.description: Knocks 'em down one after another, fast and accurate. Ceobe is always ready to go after the bad guys.
LanguageData.AK_Recruit_Ceobe.name: Ceobe
LanguageData.AK_Recruit_Delphine.name: Delphine
LanguageData.AK_Recruit_Dusk.description: Summon your courage to talk to her before she loses interest! Coming on a whim, the great painter, Dusk, puts only the finishing touches on all jobs.
LanguageData.AK_Recruit_Dusk.name: Dusk
LanguageData.AK_Recruit_Eyjafjalla.description: Hardworking and earnest all the time. Eyjafjalla, Caster Operator of Rhodes Island, has wanted to devote herself to doing something for you.
LanguageData.AK_Recruit_Eyjafjalla.name: Eyjafjalla
LanguageData.AK_Recruit_Goldenglow.description: Hairdresser and new Caster Goldenglow, tormented by the cycle of shocking and getting shocked.
LanguageData.AK_Recruit_Goldenglow.name: Goldenglow
LanguageData.AK_Recruit_Harmonie.description: Ex-double agent Harmonie, now taking your orders.\nIt's true, she does hold no ill will toward anyone.
LanguageData.AK_Recruit_Harmonie.name: Harmonie
LanguageData.AK_Recruit_Heteronucleoid.name: Heteronucleoid
LanguageData.AK_Recruit_Hoolheyak.description: Caster Operator Ho'olheyak, traversed through the course of history. She once tried to go against it, but now she decided to go with the flow.
LanguageData.AK_Recruit_Hoolheyak.name: Hoolheyak
LanguageData.AK_Recruit_Ifrit.description: She was born to set things on fire, and it has become a hobby of hers. Ifrit, former test subject of Rhine Lab, will incinerate all of Silence's enemies.
LanguageData.AK_Recruit_Ifrit.name: Ifrit
LanguageData.AK_Recruit_Indigo.description: Caster Indigo, comes bearing a light. Don't ask for her opinions on Rhodes Island's current lighting systems, unless you're looking forward to a deck-wide lightshow.
LanguageData.AK_Recruit_Indigo.name: Aria
LanguageData.AK_Recruit_Kjera.description: Saintess's Attendant Kjera, from the summit of the snowy mount she came. When troubles come knocking, seek a word or two from her—she'll comfort you.
LanguageData.AK_Recruit_Kjera.name: Kjera
LanguageData.AK_Recruit_LapplandTheDecadenza.name: Lappland the Decadenza
LanguageData.AK_Recruit_Lava.name: Lava
LanguageData.AK_Recruit_Lin.description: The mystery character from Lungmen, helping you amidst the shadows. If you opt to trust her, then some questions you'll just have to swallow.
LanguageData.AK_Recruit_Lin.name: Lin
LanguageData.AK_Recruit_Mint.description: Curiosity is her greatest weapon. Mint, the Victorian Caster, seeks recognition as a scholar far more than as a Caster.
LanguageData.AK_Recruit_Mint.name: Eleanor
LanguageData.AK_Recruit_Mostima.description: You'll have to find her first. Mostima, Senior Messenger, will lay low all obstacles in your path with her Arts.
LanguageData.AK_Recruit_Mostima.name: Mostima
LanguageData.AK_Recruit_Nymph.name: Nymph
LanguageData.AK_Recruit_Passenger.description: Engineering Operator Passenger, thunderous punisher of enemies. His various autonomous weapons bear only models with no names, and telling the difference when they're iterated is a little hard.
LanguageData.AK_Recruit_Passenger.name: Elliot
LanguageData.AK_Recruit_Santalla.name: Santalla
LanguageData.AK_Recruit_Skyfire.description: Fine her if she triggers the fire alarm again! Skyfire, Operator from Victoria, is ready to burn anyone foolish enough to stand in her way.
LanguageData.AK_Recruit_Skyfire.name: Ethelflaed
LanguageData.AK_Recruit_Tomimi.description: Tomimi, Caster Operator, is currently undergoing special training in Rhodes Island.
LanguageData.AK_Recruit_Tomimi.name: Tomimi
